document_data.name: ''Dread Helm''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''dread helm''''' was a [[magic item|magical]] [[helmet|helm]] that made its wearer's eyes glow red.
document_data.Description: ''Dread helms'' were typically made of [[steel]] and had a fearsome appearance.
document_data.Powers: The ''dread helm'' caused its wearer's eyes to glow red, This power only worked while the user wore it.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Warduke]], the evil mercenary of the [[League of Malevolence]].
